subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: There will be little rest for the Rangers in their return to N.H.L. play, as they face the Chicago Blackhawks on Thursday before traveling to Philadelphia on Saturday and hosting the Boston Bruins on Sunday.
snippet: There will be little rest for the Rangers in their return to N.H.L. play, as they face the Chicago Blackhawks on Thursday before traveling to Philadelphia on Saturday and hosting the Boston Bruins on Sunday.
